last_episode_to_air.name: All About the Benjamins
last_episode_to_air.overview: With Bethenny and Fredrik's renovation coming to an end, they prepare to put the apartment on the market; Fredrik celebrates the pending arrival of his twins; Bethenny and Fredrik's design choices are put on display at their first open house.

name: Bethenny and Fredrik
overview: Bethenny Frankel and Fredrik Eklund come together in their new venture as real estate moguls and business partners to find, buy, design, and flip multimillion-dollar properties.

episodes.name: Bethenny & Fredrik Inc
episodes.overview: Fredrik invites Bethenny to see what could be their first potential investment property together as business partners; Bethenny fears it could be more of a money pit than a successful flip; and both are left wondering if business and friendship can actually mix.

episodes.name: The Proof Is in the Porcelain
episodes.overview: Bethenny and Fredrik break the news of their partnership to the design team, but not before Bethenny’s surprise guests cause some tension amongst the group. With new budget cuts happening, Fredrik is forced to make some major compromises. Meanwhile Bethenny is back in the dating pool with Fredrik as her matchmaker.

episodes.name: Hitting the Pavement
episodes.overview: With construction underway, Fredrik and Bethenny embark on the search for their next investment property. But Fredrik’s choice of apartments and upcoming travel plans make Bethenny question how serious he’s taking their new venture.

episodes.name: Tribecalvania
episodes.overview: Tensions arise when Fredrik learns that Bethenny viewed a potential investment property with his assistant while he was away in Africa; Fredrik and his husband begin to prepare for the arrival of their twins.

episodes.name: Beach Retreat
episodes.overview: The property hunt is moved to the Hamptons. Frankel and Eklund face off in a dance competition.

episodes.name: He Said, She Said
episodes.overview: Bethenny questions Fredrik's motives after finding some unexpected numbers in the renovation budget; when Bethenny confronts Fredrik, the future of their relationship is put in jeopardy.

episodes.name: The Finish Line
episodes.overview: Bethenny and Fredrik kick into high gear to meet their renovation deadline; Fredrik flexes his construction muscles while both shop for a porcelain throne; as time runs out, Bethenny and Fredrik hope the apartment can be staged and finished in time.

episodes.name: All About the Benjamins
episodes.overview: With Bethenny and Fredrik's renovation coming to an end, they prepare to put the apartment on the market; Fredrik celebrates the pending arrival of his twins; Bethenny and Fredrik's design choices are put on display at their first open house.
